amendment.description: Manager's amendment consists of the text of the amendment that appears on pages H6036-H8040 in the Congressional Record for September 15, 2005.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to authorize $60 million in additional funds for operation and maintenance of the Coast Guard as a result of Hurricane Katrina and to add certain other sundry provisions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LoBiondo amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
